results.title: Effects of metformin in obesity treatment in different populations: a meta-analysis

results.title: Comparison of orlistat and orlistat plus metformin therapy between diabetic and nondiabetic groups
results.text_hl: While some studies demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is neutral on @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, others state that it has positive aspects.

results.title: Effect of GLP-1 agonists on weight loss in patients with polycystic ovary syndrome and obesity: A single-center study
results.text_hl: Our study shows improvements in weight with @GENE_GCG @GENE_2641 @@@GLP-1@@@ monotherapy versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as demonstrated by overall @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ and proportion of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ achieving >5% @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@.

results.title: GDF-15 as a Weight Watcher for Diabetic and Non-Diabetic People Treated With Metformin
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use has been associated with @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ and it is noteworthy that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ was of a lesser extent in non-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ people.

results.title: Short-term effect of beinaglutide combined with metformin versus metformin alone on weight loss and metabolic profiles in obese patients with polycystic ovary syndrome: a pilot randomized trial
results.text_hl: Although many studies have confirmed the @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight@@@ reduction effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and GLP-1RA, the potential action of @CHEMICAL_glucagon_like_peptide_1_(7_36) @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061970 @@@beinaglutide@@@ combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone on @<m>DISEASE_Weight_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ has not yet been studied.
